titles.title: A bill to limit the promulgation of rules relating to impact aid payments pursuant to section 2 of Public Law 81-874.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

bill.summary: 6/26/1987--Introduced. Prohibits the Secretary of Education, except as expressly provided by Act of Congress, from changing, amending, or modifying rules and regulations in effect on April 30, 1987, and issued pursuant to specified provisions of Federal law relating to impact aid payments.
